00020 #ifndef CO_WORKER_H
00021 #define CO_WORKER_H
00022

00024 #include <co/types.h>

00026 #include <limits.h>
00027 
00028 #ifndef CO_WORKER_API
00029 #  define CO_WORKER_API CO_API
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 namespace co
00033 {
00035 template< class Q > class WorkerThread : public lunchbox::Thread
00036 {
00037 public:
00039     WorkerThread( const size_t maxSize = ULONG_MAX ) : _commands( maxSize ) {}
00040 
00042     virtual ~WorkerThread() {}
00043 
00045     Q* getWorkerQueue() { return &_commands; }
00046 
00047 protected:
00049     CO_WORKER_API void run() override;
00050 
00052     virtual bool stopRunning() { return false; }
00053 
00055     virtual bool notifyIdle() { return false; }
00056 
00057 private:
00059     Q _commands;
00060 };
00061 
00062 typedef WorkerThread< CommandQueue > Worker; // instantiated in worker.cpp
00063 }
00064 #endif //CO_WORKER_H
